message: I propose a fair 90/10 split.  I think it's a good starting point. What do you say?
I think you're being too greedy with the 90% offer. I'm willing to give you 30% to start, but I want more in the next round.
Let's be reasonable.  A 50/50 split is fair, considering your last offer.  We can avoid further rounds and get something.
I'm starting to think we're not going to agree on a fair split.  I'm willing to meet you at 50/50, but I'm not sure how much longer I can keep playing with the inflation.
